app_description: Upload multiple PDFs to automatically separate color pages from black & white pages.
insert_blank_pages: Insert blank page between different documents
error_invalid_pdf: Error: {filename} is not a valid PDF
step_1: Upload one or multiple PDF files using the file selector above
step_2: Adjust the color detection threshold - higher values are more sensitive to color
step_3: Optionally enable blank page insertion between different documents
step_4: Click "Split PDFs" to start processing - this happens entirely in your browser
step_5: Two PDFs will be automatically downloaded: color_pages.pdf and bw_pages.pdf
privacy_local: ✅ All processing happens locally in your browser - your PDFs never leave your device
privacy_no_upload: ✅ No server uploads or data collection
privacy_offline: ✅ Works completely offline once the page is loaded
tip_subtle: • For documents with subtle colors, try lowering the threshold (20-40)
tip_bold: • For documents with bold colors only, try raising the threshold (60-80)
tip_large: • Large PDFs may take longer to process - please be patient
tip_incorrect: • If a page appears incorrectly classified, adjust the threshold and try again
